subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Although A. J. Burnett and catcher Jorge Posada clashed noticeably on pitch selection in the Yankees’ 14-1 loss to Boston on Saturday, Burnett insisted that it was his fault, not Posada’s.
snippet: Although A. J. Burnett and catcher Jorge Posada clashed noticeably on pitch selection in the Yankees’ 14-1 loss to Boston on Saturday, Burnett insisted that it was his fault, not Posada’s.
